instructions.da: Foretag et svagt venstresving mod Destination 1
instructions.de: Am Kreisverkehr leicht links Richtung Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight left towards Destination 1
instructions.es: Sigue levemente a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Siga ligeramente a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran, lakukan agak ke kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda fai una sinistra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź łagodnie w lewo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Siga suave à esquerda sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Siga ligeiramente à esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați ușor stânga spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 üzerindeki göbekli kavşakta hafif sol yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно ліворуч в напрямку Destination 1
